Package vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.applicationlayer.attestation.issuer

Class VerificationInformationSegmentAttestation

java.lang.Object
vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.applicationlayer.attestation.issuer.VerificationInformationSegmentAttestation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class VerificationInformationSegmentAttestation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class representing an non-encrypted version of the verification information segment of the IssuerPartAttestation.
See Also:
Serialized Form
"Implementation Note:"
This class represents the non-encrypted version of the verification information segment. To obtain an encrypted version, call the encrypt(key) method.
